game_description: Need a wonderful trip!! Or looking for a fun time: this is travel time !! You can now choose your own journey and enjoy discovering different wonderlands. Wonder Trip is an organized journey into many lands: desert Pearl, dinosaurs land, jetski island, and more. Live your journey with a series of four stages: 1- panoramic tour: firstly, you can get a beautiful guided panoramic view from the sky by riding Alladinâ€™s carpet, a Gyrosphere, and more, 2- exploration-free time: get your free time to explore different monuments: the hidden village, the fantastic oasis, the secret cave, the dinosaur lake, and more surprises by riding a camel, a dinosaur, or a jetski 3- challenging mission: wonder trip allows you to show your skills by competing with local people in jetski racing or camel riding. You can also live the adventure of escaping from the panicked dinosaurs and Predatory birds. 4- meditation time: enjoy a peaceful time, and get a special moment at the end of your journey. Get relaxed by watching the stars in the Sahara at night, enjoying a beautiful sunset over parasailing, or meditating by riding a cable car. Your journey has started. Wonder Trip is possible now...
review_1: The game has an original scenario and recent updates, but it requires further improvement in terms of graphics and menu design. Additionally, the core mechanisms, controls, and camera angles could benefit from more work. Despite these areas for improvement, overall, it is still considered an excellent game.
review_2: Not good at all fly into game race 2 laps around a short circuit then back in the air to parasail around the island then the end. Hopefully game will expand with their Jurassic world tease at the beginning
review_3: Wonderful experience, especially racing part, and the para-sailing. It was amazing!
